channel.title: New at rs2 server development help?
channel.description: I've created classic servers I've been told rs2 servers are easier I don't know if that's true, I just wanted to know where to start with making a rs2 server what are things I would need thanks.

item.title: New at rs2 server development help?
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“skarletdeath, post:1, topic:518455”]I’ve created classic servers I’ve been told rs2 servers are easier I don’t know if that’s true,
I just wanted to know where to start with making a rs2 server what are things I would need thanks.[/quote]

The shops work the same , i found the classic one easier (EASY RSC).

added monster spawn and editing shops is really easy

i have made solo GAMES for both marcscape 2006 (rs2 2006) and RSC classic hack solo (RSC)

i can give you 2006remade source they sole from 2006scape . both are shut down now.

Read full topic
item.source: New at rs2 server development help?
